titleStmt.title: The reasons vvhich Doctour Hill hath brought, for the vpholding of papistry, which is falselie termed the Catholike religion: vnmasked and shewed to be very weake, and vpon examination most insufficient for that purpose: by George Abbot ... The first part.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, & are to be sold in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne by Simon VVaterson,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Hill, Edmund Thomas. A quatran of reasons of Catholike religion.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
